00057         virtual btScalar solveGroupCacheFriendlySetup(btCollisionObject** bodies, int numBodies, btPersistentManifold** manifoldPtr, int numManifolds,btTypedConstraint** constraints,int numConstraints,const btContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal,btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer);
